channel.title: aircraft observation on Yu-Wen Chen
channel.description: Recent content in aircraft observation on Yu-Wen Chen

item.title: Intercomparison of aircraft and ground based measurements near major pollution sources over Taiwan (Ongoing)
item.description:
In this project, we focus on the pollutions near major sources over western Taiwan. Aircraft-based observation data are analyzed and compared with surface measurements to investigate near surface chemical reactions of pollutants. The result will be presented in 18th ACC in Taipei in Dec. 2019.

  • Aircraft-baed observation
  • Ground-based measurements
  • Sounding and Lidar data
  • Reanalysis data
